member.name: FILE_USAGE_TYPE
member.summary: Constants used by to indicate how a file in use is being used.

member.name: FILE_USAGE_TYPE.FUT_PLAYING
member.summary: The file is being played by the process that has it open.

member.name: FILE_USAGE_TYPE.FUT_EDITING
member.summary: The file is being edited by the process that has it open.

member.name: FILE_USAGE_TYPE.FUT_GENERIC
member.summary: The file is open in the process for an unspecified action or an action that does not readily fit into the other two categories.
